trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_SEQ_00<tab>Debroye is in a state of despair.

TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_SEQ_01<tab>Debroye has tasked you with crafting pinches of ascorbic additive.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 160. Delivering items with a rating of 340 or more will earn greater rewards.

TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the ascorbic additive to an ecstatic Debroye. The current incarnation of Mervynbread is a delectable success, and she insists that you be in attendance when the Forum is ready to make their evaluation.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_TODO_00<tab>Deliver pinches of ascorbic additive to Debroye.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_000<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_100_000<tab>I've been trying and trying to make that ascorbic acid.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_001<tab>I've done exactly as Jalvaaz instructed, followed his steps to the letter, but it all ends in failure.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_002<tab>As embarrassing as it is to admit, I simply lack the expertise─the process requires a far more competent hand than mine.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_003<tab>So, here I am at the last, asking for your help once more...
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_004<tab>Please, I need you to manufacture the additive that will perfect our perfect meal!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The Studium Deliveries list for Debroye has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Debroye.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_010<tab>All our Mervynbread needs is a viable ascorbic additive. I may have failed in that endeavor, but I have faith that you will succeed!

TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_020<tab>Ascorbic acid created from plain old coconut milk... I understand the idea in practice, but as you saw, the process itself was beyond my abilities. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_021<tab>Incredible─it's practically glowing with goodness! With this added to our creation, I have every confidence that the bread will pass any test they care to subject it to!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_030<tab>With your additive, well, added to the mix, I put a batch of Mervynbread into the oven to bake. It should be ready any moment now!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_031<tab>This is it─the final, fluffy result of much trial and error.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_A1_000_001<tab>It looks delicious!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_A1_000_002<tab>It looks so...familiar.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_032<tab>Well, have a bite!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_100_032<tab>And? How does it taste?
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_A2_000_001<tab>As amazing as it looks!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_A2_000_002<tab>Like streams of flavor, blending into a single river of ambrosial delight!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_200_032<tab>Wonderful! And the texture...?
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_A3_000_001<tab>It's like biting into a soft-baked cloud!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_A3_000_002<tab>It's like natural law has been suspended to create this one moment of unparalleled, puffy-crusted bliss!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_300_032<tab>Fantastic! And last but not least, what did you think of the aroma?
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_A4_000_001<tab>That luscious, savory smell is to die for!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_A4_000_002<tab>It's like a siren scent of savory temptation which no mortal stomach can resist!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_034<tab>Exactly what I thought! All the disparate elements have come together so well...
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_100_034<tab>Flavor, texture, aroma─not to mention a perfect balance of nutrients.
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_035<tab>And I have you to thank for this delectable achievement!

TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_DEBROYE_000_036<tab>Yes, I believe this current incarnation of Mervynbread has a good chance of swaying the Forum in our favor. You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> attending the evaluation, aren't you? In fact, I must insist upon it!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>Debroye is thrilled with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Consummate Baker<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKLA306_04151_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>The next request will be available from Debroye upon reaching level 90 as an alchemist or culinarian.
